member.name: T:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml
member.summary: Rpc-Xml DokuWiki connector class
DokuWiki Rpc-Xml connector

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: (class) Rpc-Xml Constructor

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.Get``1(stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.XmlRpcRequest,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute DokuWiki command

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.Get``1(stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.XmlRpcRequest,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Execute DokuWiki command

member.summary: Execute DokuWiki command

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.Get``1(System.String)
member.summary: Execute DokuWiki command

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAuth(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Uses the provided credentials to execute a login and will set cookies. This can be used to make authenticated requests afterwards.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuVersion
member.summary: Returns the DokuWiki version of the remote Wiki.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuXMLRPCAPIVersion
member.summary: Returns the XML RPC interface version of the remote Wiki. This is DokuWiki implementation specific and independent of the supported standard API version returned by wiki.getRPCVersionSupported

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuRPCVersionSupported
member.summary: Returns 2 with the supported RPC API version.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuGetTimeStamp
member.summary: Returns the current time at the remote wiki server as Unix timestamp.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuGetDateTime
member.summary: Returns the current time at the remote wiki server as DateTime.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuSearch(System.String)
member.summary: Search return associative array with matching pages similar to what is returned by dokuwiki.getPagelist, snippets are provided for the first 15 results.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuTitle
member.summary: Returns the title of the wiki.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Lists all pages within a given namespace.
member.example: example foreach all page in namespace "wiki:*"

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageListAll
member.summary: Returns a list of all Wiki pages in the remote Wiki.
member.example: Return (array) One item for each page, each item containing the following data: id = id of the page. perms = integer denoting the permissions on the page. size = size in bytes. lastModified = dateTime object of last modification date.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageAclCheck(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the permission of the given wikipage.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageGet(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Get DokuWiki raw/html Wiki text for a page.
member.remarks: isHtml = false : Returns the raw Wiki text for a page isHtml = true : Returns the rendered XHTML body of a Wiki page

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageGetVersion(System.String,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the raw/html Wiki text for a page with DateTime.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageGetVersion(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the raw/html Wiki text for a page with Date and Time string.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageGetVersion(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns the raw/html Wiki text for a page with timestamp.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageGetVersions(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the available versions of a Wiki page. The number of pages in the result is controlled via the recent configuration setting. The offset can be used to list earlier versions in the history.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about a Wiki page.
member.example: Returns (array) an array containing the following data: name = page name. lastModified = modification date as IXR_Date Object. author = author of the Wiki page. version = page version as timestamp.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageInfoVersion(System.String,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns information about a Wiki page with DateTime.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageInfoVersion(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about a Wiki page with Date and Time string.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageInfoVersion(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns information about a Wiki page with timestamp.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageLinks(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of all links contained in a Wiki page.
member.example: Return (array) each array item holds the following data: type = local/extern page = the wiki page (or the complete URL if extern) href = the complete URL

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageLinksBack(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of backlinks of a Wiki page. See: https://www.dokuwiki.org/backlinks

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPagePut(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Create or update Wiki Page.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageAppend(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Append text to Wiki Page.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageInsert(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Insert text to Wiki Page.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPageClear(System.String)
member.summary: Clear all text from Wiki Page.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPagesChange(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given DateTime.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPagesChange(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given Date andTime string.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuPagesChange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given timestamp. As stated: Only the most recent change for each page is listed, regardless of how many times that page was changed.
member.example: Return (array) each array item holds the following data: name = page id lastModified = modification date as UTC timestamp author = author version = page version as timestamp

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuMediaChange(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given DateTime.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuMediaChange(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given Date and Time string.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuMediaChange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of recent changes since given timestamp. As stated: Only the most recent change for each page is listed, regardless of how many times that page was changed.
member.example: Return (array) each array item holds the following data: name = page id lastModified = modification date as UTC timestamp author = author version = page version as timestamp perms = media permissions size = media size in bytes

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentList(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a list of media files in a given namespace.
member.example: id = media id file = name of the file size = size in bytes mtime = upload date as a timestamp lastModified = modification date as XML-RPC Date object isimg = true if file is an image, false otherwise writable = true if file is writable, false otherwise perms = permissions of file

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentInfo(System.String)
member.summary: Returns information about a media file.
member.example: size = size in bytes lastModified = modification date as XML-RPC Date object

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentGet(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the object data of a media file.
member.returns: the data of the file in byte[] format

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentPut(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads a file as a given media id, source as full file path.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentPut(System.String,System.Byte[],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads a file as a given media id, source as byte array.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentPut(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Uploads a file as a given media id, source as Base64 encoded.

member.name: M:stDokuWiki.Connector.RpcXml.DokuAttachmentRemove(System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a file. Fails if the file is still referenced from any page in the wiki.
